data.comment: Today's referee, David Webb, has blown to start the match.
Chris Martin puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 2, Great play from Antoine Semenyo to set up the goal.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Bristol City's Chris Martin has been booked in Cardiff.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Cardiff.
Marlon Pack is booked for the home team.
The home team have replaced Sheyi Ojo with Robert Glatzel. This is the first substitution made today by Neil Harris.
In the minute 73, Chris Brunt is on a sub for Nahki Wells for Bristol City.
Josh Murphy is replacing Junior Hoilett for the home team.
Bristol City make their second substitution with Taylor Moore replacing Jamie Paterson.
In the minute 88, Tommy Rowe is replacing Jay DaSilva for Bristol City at Cardiff City Stadium.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
